attributes.action: Step down from power and sign it over to Jeremy Clarkson (the topgear presenter)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Jeremy Clarkson is the sort of person that believes in no-nonsense solutions to over complicated problems that the current PM has created. For example road pricing and global warming.
    He has a simple and low cost solution to every problem that the current government faces. Instead of spending millions of tax payers hard earned cash, he will solve the problem without these expenses.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
